headline: Open sourcing our Sentry SSO plugin
keywords: Cloudflare Zero Trust, Cloudflare Access, Security, SSO, VPN
description: Cloudflare Access, part of Cloudflare for Teams, replaces legacy corporate VPNs with Cloudflare’s global network. Using your existing identity provider, Access enables your end users to login from anywhere — without a clunky agent or traffic backhaul through a centralized appliance or VPN.
